warning: false gas_prices <- read.csv(text = " State,Regular Alaska,3.762 Alabama,2.789 Arkansas,2.811 Arizona,3.172 California,4.473 Colorado,3.024 Connecticut,3.109 Washington D.C.,3.329 Delaware,3.072 Florida,3.123 Georgia,2.918 Hawaii,4.465 Iowa,2.964 Idaho,3.477 Illinois,3.388 Indiana,3.077 Kansas,2.851 Kentucky,2.918 Louisiana,2.770 Massachusetts,3.045 Maryland,3.107 Maine,3.075 Washington,4.385 Wisconsin,2.906 West Virginia,3.080 Wyoming,3.098 ", header = TRUE) ev_prices <- read.csv(text = " State,Cost_per_kWh Alaska,0.510 Alabama,0.437 Arkansas,0.424 Arizona,0.419 California,0.384 Colorado,0.334 Connecticut,0.368 Washington D.C.,0.337 Delaware,0.321 Florida,0.391 Georgia,0.383 Hawaii,0.468 Iowa,0.341 Idaho,0.394 Illinois,0.383 Indiana,0.380 Kansas,0.252 Kentucky,0.425 Louisiana,0.427 Massachusetts,0.344 Maryland,0.283 Maine,0.382 Michigan,0.371 Minnesota,0.378 Missouri,0.278 Mississippi,0.382 Montana,0.455 North Carolina,0.336 North Dakota,0.424 Nebraska,0.299 New Hampshire,0.434 New Jersey,0.388 New Mexico,0.372 Nevada,0.405 New York,0.354 Ohio,0.403 Oklahoma,0.407 Oregon,0.392 Pennsylvania,0.363 Rhode Island,0.347 South Carolina,0.440 South Dakota,0.341 Tennessee,0.467 Texas,0.365 Utah,0.287 Virginia,0.343 Vermont,0.335 Washington,0.348 Wisconsin,0.429 West Virginia,0.524 Wyoming,0.386 ", header = TRUE) gas_prices <- as_tibble(gas_prices) ev_prices <- as_tibble(ev_prices) combined_data <- left_join(gas_prices, ev_prices, by = "State") combined_data <- combined_data |> mutate( EV_3yr_Cost = Cost_per_kWh * 4050 * 3, Gas_3yr_Cost = Regular * 540 * 3 ) combined_data <- combined_data %>% mutate( cost_diff = Gas_3yr_Cost - EV_3yr_Cost ) # Constants annual_miles <- 13500 ev_efficiency_kWh_per_mile <- 0.3 gas_efficiency_mpg <- 25 combined_data linear_reg()|> fit(Gas_3yr_Cost ~ EV_3yr_Cost + Regular + Cost_per_kWh, data = combined_data) ``` ```{r} #| label: Interactive Plot # Get US state map data and convert to polygons states_map <- map_data("state") # Merge with your combined cost data combined_data <- combined_data %>% mutate(region = tolower(State), cost_diff = Gas_3yr_Cost - EV_3yr_Cost) # Join map and cost data map_data_joined <- left_join(states_map, combined_data, by = "region") # Create polygons for leaflet (use group_by + nest coordinates) state_polygons <- map_data_joined %>% group_by(region, group) %>% summarize(do_union = FALSE, geometry = st_sfc(st_polygon(list(cbind(long, lat)))), .groups = "drop") %>% st_as_sf() # Join cost difference back in state_polygons <- left_join(state_polygons, combined_data, by = "region") # Build leaflet map leaflet(state_polygons) %>% addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>% addPolygons( fillColor = ~colorNumeric("RdYlGn", domain = cost_diff, reverse = TRUE)(cost_diff), fillOpacity = 0.7, weight = 0.5, color = "white", popup = ~paste0( "", State, "
", "Gas 3-yr: $", round(Gas_3yr_Cost, 2), "
", "EV 3-yr: $", round(EV_3yr_Cost, 2), "
", "Diff: $", round(cost_diff, 2) ) ) %>% addLegend( position = "bottomright", pal = colorNumeric("RdYlGn", domain = state_polygons$cost_diff, reverse = TRUE), values = ~cost_diff, title = "Gas - EV Cost Diff", labFormat = labelFormat(prefix = "$") ) ```
